ascend_skill.desc:
On ally's action, gain 1 Ice Crystal stack. Stacks up to 12 times. After using a skill, when Ice Crystal reaches 10 stacks, activate Resonance, spending 10 Ice Crystal stacks to deal 65% follow-up Ice damage to the main target. This Resonance is guaranteed to be a critical hit.
When using Frost Lily or Winter Storm, if the Resonance is activated, gain Parhelion.
Parhelion is used to strengthen Durandal of Ice.
ascend_skill.name: Blade Dancer

ascend_skill.desc: At the end of Kotone's action, gain a shield equal to 15% of Attack for 1 turn.
ascend_skill.name: Camel Spin

ascend_skill.desc: Increase Resonance damage based on foe's missing HP (up to 50%).
ascend_skill.name: Ice Princess

ascend_skill.desc: Increase the skill levels of Frost Lily and Winter Storm by 2.
ascend_skill.name: Heart of Ice

ascend_skill.desc: Highlight Enhanced: Increase Highlight damage up to 60%.
ascend_skill.name: Resilience

ascend_skill.desc: Increase the skill levels of Durandal of Ice and Thief Tactics by 2.
ascend_skill.name: Axel Jump

ascend_skill.desc: At the start of battle, gain 4 Ice Crystal stacks. Increase the maximum number of Ice Crystal stacks to 15.
ascend_skill.name: Opening Ceremony

highlight_skill.desc: Deal Ice damage to 1 foe equal to 292.8%/322.8%/304.8%/334.8% of Attack. Increase damage based on foe's missing HP. When foe's HP is below 20%, increase by up to 30%.
highlight_skill.name: Highlight

normal_skill.desc: Deal Ice damage to all foes equal to 87.1%/96.0%/90.6%/99.5% of Attack. 29.3%/29.3%/30.5%/30.5% chance to inflict Freeze.
normal_skill.name: Frost Lily

normal_skill.desc: Deal Ice damage to 1 foe equal to 160.4%/176.8%/166.9%/183.4% of Attack. Gain 4 Ice Crystal stacks.
normal_skill.name: Winter Storm

normal_skill.desc:
Deal Ice damage to 1 foe equal to 179.7%/198.1%/187.0%/205.5% of Attack. When Kotone has Parhelion or 10+ Ice Crystal stacks, increase damage based on foe's missing HP (up to 29.3%/29.3%/30.5%/30.5%).
When Blade Dancer is activated, increase damage based on foe's missing HP (up to 29.3%/29.3%/30.5%/30.5%).
normal_skill.name: Durandal of Ice

passive_skill.desc: When damaging foes with Blade Dancer, 100.0% chance to inflict Freeze.
passive_skill.name: Frozen in Time

passive_skill.desc: When Kotone defeats a foe, gain 4 Ice Crystal stacks.
passive_skill.name: State of Selflessness
